services company Siemens and Spanish wind power developer Gamesa announced Thursday they had signed initial contracts to build wind turbine factories and a research centre at the port of Hull and in Dundee and Glasgow, respectively. The race for offshore wind manufacturing jobs is on(...) I'm determined the economy benefits from the opportunities and jobs of the offshore wind supply chain, said Energy and Climate Change Secretary Chris Huhne . Together these projects would create up to 1,000 jobs at a time when workers across the country are increasingly worried about losing employment amid severe government spending cuts.
